TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed GeneratedCodeAnalysisFlags extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Flags to configure mode of generated code analysis.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.GeneratedCodeAnalysisFlags Analyze = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Enable analyzer action callbacks for generated code. Analyzer driver will make callbacks into the analyzer for all entities (source files, symbols, etc.) in the compilation, including generated code.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.GeneratedCodeAnalysisFlags None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Disable analyzer action callbacks and diagnostic reporting for generated code. Analyzer driver will not make callbacks into the analyzer for entities (source files, symbols, etc.) that it classifies as generated code. Additionally, any diagnostic reported by the analyzer with location in generated code will not be reported.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.GeneratedCodeAnalysisFlags ReportDiagnostics = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Enable reporting diagnostics on generated code. Analyzer driver will not suppress any analyzer diagnostic based on whether or not it's location is in generated code.
